name: Fantasy Realms
description: Epic battles in magical worlds with dragons, wizards, and ancient artifacts

cards.title: Dragon Unbound
cards.description: Ancient dragon breaks its chains and takes flight over a burning citadel
cards.imageDescription: Ancient red dragon breaking chains above a burning citadel, smoke and fire, dramatic sky
cards.effect: On summon: deal 3 damage to all enemy champions; When attacking: +2 damage if MP >= 5
cards.flavor: Freedom paid in fire.

cards.title: Counter Maneuver
cards.description: Anticipate and negate an opponent's move
cards.imageDescription: Shield shattering an incoming sword strike, sparks flying
cards.effect: Negate the next action, +1 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: Timing is everything.

cards.title: Fireball
cards.description: Hurl a ball of fire at your enemies
cards.imageDescription: Wizard casting a glowing fireball with intense flames
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion
cards.flavor: The classic spell of choice for aspiring mages.

cards.title: Magical Storm
cards.description: A sudden storm disrupts the battlefield
cards.imageDescription: Dark clouds gathering with lightning bolts striking the ground
cards.effect: All champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: Even the weather conspires against the combatants.

cards.title: Lich King
cards.description: Undead monarch wielding necromantic powers
cards.imageDescription: Skeleton king in ornate armor wielding a scepter, surrounded by swirling mist
cards.effect: On summon: return 2 cards from your discard to your deck; Passive: +1 MP regeneration
cards.flavor: Death is not the end, but merely a beginning.

cards.title: Healing Light
cards.description: Restore health to yourself or an ally
cards.imageDescription: Golden light emanating from a cleric's hands, healing wounds
cards.effect: Restore 3 HP to target champion
cards.flavor: The power of light can mend even the deepest wounds.

cards.title: Goblin Warrior
cards.description: A fierce goblin warrior with crude armor and a sharp blade
cards.imageDescription: Small green goblin with leather armor wielding a rusty sword, fierce expression
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target
cards.flavor: Small in stature, big in attitude.

cards.title: Ancient Golem
cards.description: A massive stone construct animated by ancient magic
cards.imageDescription: Huge stone golem with glowing runes, standing guard over ancient ruins
cards.effect: Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects; On summon: Gain 3 armor
cards.flavor: Built to last an eternity.

cards.title: Knight Defender
cards.description: A noble knight sworn to protect the realm for a limited time
cards.imageDescription: Armored knight with shield and sword, standing guard at a castle gate
cards.effect: Passive: Reduce damage to player by 1; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target
cards.flavor: Honor binds me, duty drives me, time limits me.

cards.title: Legendary Dragon Sovereign
cards.description: The most powerful dragon in existence, awakened by concentrated magical energy
cards.imageDescription: Massive ancient dragon with golden scales, surrounded by swirling magical energy, perched on a mountain of treasure
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 5 damage to all enemy champions; Passive: +3 damage to all attacks; When attacking: Gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: Born from the dreams of mortals and the power of pure magic.

cards.title: Archmage of the Eternal Flame
cards.description: The most powerful spellcaster in the realm, master of all schools of magic
cards.imageDescription: Ancient wizard in ornate robes, surrounded by floating spellbooks and crackling magical energy
cards.effect: On summon: Add 3 random spell cards to your hand; Passive: All spell cards cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Deal damage equal to the number of spells in your hand
cards.flavor: Knowledge is power, but magic is knowledge made manifest.

cards.title: Celestial Avatar
cards.description: A divine being that has taken mortal form to guide the faithful
cards.imageDescription: Radiant figure with glowing wings and halo, surrounded by heavenly light
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 6 HP to all your champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by enemy effects; When attacking: Heal 3 HP to player
cards.flavor: The light of heaven shines through mortal form.

cards.title: Demon Lord of the Abyss
cards.description: A powerful fiend from the deepest pits of hell, commanding legions of darkness
cards.imageDescription: Horned demon with glowing red eyes, standing in a throne room of bones and fire
cards.effect: On summon: All opponent champions lose 2 MP regeneration; Passive: When you play an event, deal 1 damage to all opponents; When attacking: +3 damage if MP >= 3
cards.flavor: From the depths of despair, I rise to claim dominion.

cards.title: Prince of Elemental Realms
cards.description: A being of pure elemental power who commands the forces of nature itself
cards.imageDescription: Majestic figure composed of swirling elements - fire, water, earth, and air
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 2 damage to all champions; Passive: Gain 1 MP at the start of each turn; When attacking: Choose fire, water, earth, or air effect
cards.flavor: I am the storm, the earthquake, the tsunami, and the inferno.

cards.title: The Time Keeper
cards.description: A mysterious entity that exists outside the flow of time, manipulating past and future
cards.imageDescription: Ethereal being with hourglass body, surrounded by swirling temporal energy and floating clocks
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 1 card
cards.flavor: In the river of time, I am both the source and the destination.

cards.title: Ancient Sorceress
cards.description: A powerful mage who has mastered the arcane arts over centuries of study
cards.imageDescription: Elderly woman in ornate robes, surrounded by floating magical symbols and ancient tomes
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random spell cards to your hand; Passive: Spells cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Deal 1 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: Age has not diminished her power, but rather focused it like a lens of pure magic.

cards.title: Ancient Ent
cards.description: A massive tree-like being that has witnessed the rise and fall of kingdoms
cards.imageDescription: Huge wooden humanoid with bark skin and glowing eyes, roots extending into the earth
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 3 HP to all your champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 2; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target
cards.flavor: I have stood since the first seed took root, and I shall stand long after the last city falls.

cards.title: Divine Intervention
cards.description: Call upon the gods for miraculous aid in your time of need
cards.imageDescription: Radiant divine light breaking through dark clouds, blessing warriors below
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn, restore 2 HP to all champions
cards.flavor: When all seems lost, the divine hand reaches down to save the faithful.

cards.title: Lightning Bolt
cards.description: Call down a bolt of divine lightning to strike your enemies
cards.imageDescription: Massive lightning bolt striking down from storm clouds onto a target
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you control a creature
cards.flavor: The wrath of heaven, delivered with precision.

cards.title: Solar Eclipse
cards.description: The sun is blotted out, empowering dark magic and weakening light-based powers
cards.imageDescription: Large moon blocking the sun, casting an eerie twilight over the battlefield
cards.effect: All dark magic champions gain +2 damage, all light magic champions lose 1 MP regeneration
cards.flavor: In darkness, the shadows grow strong.

cards.title: Shadow Wraith
cards.description: A ghostly apparition that feeds on fear and despair
cards.imageDescription: Ethereal shadow figure with glowing eyes, surrounded by dark mist
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target, opponent discards 1 card; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: Fear is its sustenance, despair its weapon.

cards.title: Magic Missile
cards.description: Launch a series of small magical projectiles at your target
cards.imageDescription: Wizard casting multiple glowing magical bolts from outstretched hands
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you have a spell card in hand
cards.flavor: Simple, reliable, and surprisingly effective.

cards.title: Shield Bash
cards.description: Use your shield as both defense and offense in a single devastating strike
cards.imageDescription: Knight slamming a large shield into an opponent with tremendous force
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, target champion cannot attack next turn
cards.flavor: Sometimes the best defense is a good offense.

cards.title: Healing Potion
cards.description: Quaff a magical potion that restores your vitality
cards.imageDescription: Glowing red potion being poured into a warrior's mouth, wounds visibly healing
cards.effect: Restore 2 HP to target champion, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: A taste of liquid sunshine that mends both body and spirit.

cards.title: Enchanted Blade
cards.description: Wield a weapon imbued with magical energy that cuts through armor
cards.imageDescription: Sword glowing with magical energy, slicing through metal and stone
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you control a unique champion
cards.flavor: Steel is merely the vessel; magic is the true edge.

cards.title: Forest Sprite
cards.description: A tiny magical being that dwells in ancient woods and protects nature
cards.imageDescription: Small glowing fairy-like creature with wings, surrounded by flowers and leaves
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn; On summon: Draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Small in size, but mighty in magic and mischief.

cards.title: Mountain Troll
cards.description: A brutish creature from the high peaks, known for its incredible strength
cards.imageDescription: Large muscular troll with stone-like skin, wielding a massive club
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 2
cards.flavor: Dumb as a rock, strong as an avalanche.

cards.title: Swamp Hag
cards.description: An ancient witch who dwells in murky waters and brews potent potions
cards.imageDescription: Wrinkled old woman with glowing eyes, stirring a cauldron in a murky swamp
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; On summon: Add 1 random common spell to your hand
cards.flavor: Her potions can heal or harm, depending on her mood.

cards.title: Desert Scorpion
cards.description: A deadly arachnid that thrives in harsh desert environments
cards.imageDescription: Large scorpion with glowing stinger, crawling across sandy dunes
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target, +1 damage if played during day phase
cards.flavor: Its sting is swift, its venom is sure, and its patience is endless.

cards.title: Cave Bat
cards.description: A nocturnal creature that hunts in dark caverns and underground lairs
cards.imageDescription: Large bat with glowing red eyes, flying through dark cave passages
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: In the darkness, it sees all and fears nothing.

cards.title: Arcane Blast
cards.description: Unleash a wave of pure magical energy that disrupts enemy magic
cards.imageDescription: Wizard releasing a burst of multicolored magical energy from both hands
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to all opponent champions, opponent loses 1 MP regeneration next turn
cards.flavor: Raw magic, uncontrolled and unstoppable.
